attributes.action: remove all no motorhome no parking signs and overnight sleeping signs in the uk
attributes.additional_details: we pay road TAX so have the right to park where other vehicle park
attributes.background: end discrimination of motorhomes and there owners

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for. 
 
Decisions about individual car parks are a matter for the relevant landowner, not the UK Government or Parliament.
